main event: A large, blue, circular object was observed hovering motionless over St. Joseph, Michigan on September 8, 1958 around 9:50 PM EST.
interesting points: The object was described as large in size and circular in shape.
The object was blue in color.
The object was initially hovering motionless, then suddenly increased in speed and disappeared from view.
The weather conditions were clear with a clear night sky.
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
